price: on ne izusti ni jednu riječ, a da pored njega nije prisutan onaj koji bdije.
arabic: مَّا يَلۡفِظُ مِن قَوۡلٍ إِلَّا لَدَيۡهِ رَقِيبٌ عَتِيدٞ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: mā yalfiẓu min qawlin illā ladayhi raqībun ʿatīdun
